scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In an essay, "Some Sins of Young Wives," Marion Harland (Mary Virginia Terhune) writes concerning some of the more common pitfalls of marriage for the young woman and the different expectations of men and women about "wedded bliss." She also discusses jealousy, marital unfaithfulness by the husband, and the necessity of children. 8 p.
